price: 34 Si vous obéissez à un homme comme vous, vous serez certainement perdus.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
